text: Donald Walsh was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Kankakee Gallagher Trojans in four games during the 1937–38 season and averaged 1.0 point per game. == References == Category:Year of birth uncertain Category:Year of death uncertain Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Illinois Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Kankakee Gallagher Trojans players
title: Don Walsh (basketball)
